channel.title: Display server name on login page and in the corner of client
channel.description:
Okay, my client when I login displays [baseserver]scape and I need to change this to [myserver]scape. And also, my client displays [baseserver]scape in the bottom right hand corner of the game screen just above the text box, and I need to know how to change that also to [myserver]scape.
Thanks :)

item.title: Display server name on login page and in the corner of client
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Go into the client’s files “Frame_sub_1.java” and it will show “baseservername” change it to “yourservername”.
Also, open the client’s “gui.java” or “egui.java” and search for “baseservername” and change to "yourservername.

Open up source’s client.java and press ctrl + h and search for “baseservername” and replace with “yourservername” hit replace all. Save. Compile. Play.

Read full topic
item.source: Display server name on login page and in the corner of client
